name: Plantabi: Little Garden
description:
WHAT IS PLANTABI?

Plantabi is a chill sandbox game where you take care of adorable plants and design the cozy little garden of your dreams!

YOUR LITTLE GARDEN

Feel the laid-back vibes as you take care of your leafy buddies in your own little garden. And the fun doesn't stop there – you can unlock and collect more items to spruce up your cozy space, adding that extra touch of charm.

THE TASK

Expand your collection by helping the shop owner complete orders and unlock a wider array of plants to care for in Plantabi!

A DIFFERENT PLANT

Form a unique bond with a fellow plant collecting buddy who came from a different planet and, together, unlock a different variety of plants not seen in the shop!

ENHANCE!

Experiment with different pot designs and colors to create the perfect aesthetic for your green companions. Additionally, enhance your plants' growth by equipping a variety of orbs, each imbued with unique properties.

FEATURES:

  • Adorable 2D pixel art for a cute visual experience.
  • A wholesome and chill atmosphere that sets a relaxing tone.
  • A diverse collection of over 90 plants to nurture and cultivate in your virtual garden.
  • A wide array of items to personalize and decorate your cozy garden.
